events.message: I recently received my order but the item was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
The case has been assigned to agent Maria S. who manages refund requests for order issues.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the refund request so we can process it faster?
The order number is 12345XYZ. I want a refund because the product was different than described and not usable.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately. Please return the product within 10 days using the provided shipping label.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the product back today.
We received your returned item and have processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
As the refund has been completed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
